citation.article-title: Chitinophaga eiseniae sp. nov., isolated from vermicompost
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Description of Chitinophaga eiseniae sp. nov.
Chitinophaga eiseniae (ei.se′ni.ae. N.L. n. Eisenia a genus of earthworm used for vermicomposting, which is the source of isolation of the type strain; N.L. gen. n. eiseniae of Eisenia).
Cells are Gram-negative, aerobic, non-spore-forming, non-motile rods (0.4–0.5×1.2–1.6 µm).
Colonies are smooth, convex, circular, transparent and yellowish after 2 days of incubation at 30 °C on R2A agar.
The optimal growth temperature is 30 °C and growth occurs at 15–42 °C.
Grows at pH 6.0–10.0, with an optimum of pH6.5–8.5.
Growth occurs in the absence of NaCl and no growth occurs in the presence of >2.5 % (w/v) NaCl in R2A broth.
Resistant to streptomycin, penicillin and gentamicin (all at 10 µg), and 30 µg kanamycin, but susceptible to 10 µg tetracycline and rifampicin, and 30 µg vancomycin and chloramphenicol.
Catalase- and oxidase-positive.
Hydrolyses casein, aesculin, gelatin, carboxymethylcellulose, tyrosine and Tween 20, but not xylan, starch, Tween 80 or urea.

Utilizes dextrin, N-acetyl-d-glucosamine, cellobiose, d-fructose, l-fucose, d-galactose, gentiobiose, α-lactose, lactulose, d-mannose, methyl β-d-glucoside, l-rhamnose, sucrose, trehalose, turanose, succinic acid monomethyl ester, α-ketovaleric acid, dl-lactic acid, propionic acid, l-alanyl glycine, l-asparagine, l-aspartic acid, l-glutamic acid, l-serine and l-threonine (Biolog GN2 micro plate), and d-glucose, l-arabinose, maltose, d-mannose and N-acetyl-d-glucosamine (API 20NE) as single carbon source.
Indole and H2S are not produced.
Nitrate is not reduced to nitrite or nitrogen gas.

Positive for the following enzyme activities (API ZYM): alkaline phosphatase, esterase (C4), esterase lipase (C8), leucine arylamidase, valine arylamidase, cystine arylamidase, trypsin, acid phosphatase, naphthol-AS-BI-phosphohydrolase, α-galactosidase, β-galactosidase, α-glucosidase, β-glucosidase, N-acetyl-β-glucosaminidase and α-mannosidase.
Negative for lipase (C14), α-chymotrypsin, β-glucuronidase and α-fucosidase.
The predominant menaquinone is MK-7 and the major polyamine is homospermidine.
The polar lipid profile contains phosphatidylethanolamine, unknown aminolipids and unknown lipids.

The fatty acids are iso-C15 : 0, C16 : 1ω5c, iso-C17 : 0 3-OH, C16 : 0, anteiso-C18 : 0 and/or C18 : 2ω6,9c, iso-C15 : 0 2-OH and/or C16 : 1ω7c, C14 : 0, iso-C15 : 0 3-OH, iso-C15 : 1 G, C18 : 1ω5c, iso-C15 : 1 I and/or C13 : 0 3-OH, C13 : 0 2-OH, C16 : 0 3-OH and unknown fatty acid ECL 13.565.
The DNA G+C content of the type strain is 48.9 mol%.
The type strain, YC6729T ( = KACC 13774T = DSM 22224T), was isolated from VC at Masan, Korea.
